title: The Guacamole Burrito Truck
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Fast food, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Food truck offers vegan burritos; ask for the veggie and to hold the sour cream - tell them you are a vegan. Owner speaks perfect English and makes the salsa in front of you. The rice and the in-house-made spicy sauce are vegan as well.
